lenders.name: Dee-Dee

lenders.occupational_info: It gives more to me than I to it.  Teaching is a privalege.

lenders.name: Michael, Julie & Henry

lenders.occupational_info: I love airplanes, helping people, and watching my kids grow.

One of my goals as a teacher is to provide my students with the understanding that they have the power to make good choices.  I hope by showing and involving them in reaching out to others at a young age, that it will hopefully ignite the spark needed to make them lifetime givers.  I'm a teacher who loves his job!

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I can.

"Don't say it if it isn't true" and " Don't do it if it isn't right"

I strive to do the following:

Assist business leaders in 1) Analyzing their business' past performance and identify trends  2) Given the historical analysis, I try to help struture a plan for the future and 3) Once the future plan has been developed,  I try to help execute the plan and help them achieve the results they desire.

My eighth grade students have raised the money for the two borrowers and have actively participated in the selection process by making campaign posters, writing essays, and giving campaign speeches. It has been a wonderful melding of persuasive writing (curriculum) and humanitarian work. Plus, their perspectives have grown to include their influence in a global community.

I am proud to be Peruvian and want to give a small helping hand to people who really need it.

lenders.name: Tom & Joy
lenders.loan_because:
Life has been good to us and we like to assist and share with others.  We feel that our loans give enterprising people the chance to improve their lot in life and build a future for themselves and their families.  We believe that this is a most positive way to help impoverished  people and areas.

From another viewpoint, given the minuscule interest on idle money, it really costs very little.
lenders.occupational_info:
Tom - Retired geologist but accepting occasional projects in earth sciences, energy, and minerals..
Joy- Retired music teacher occasionally substituting as church organist. 
Both - Extensive volunteer activity  tutoring disadvantaged young adults  and working in local public library bookstore

lenders.loan_because: Matthew 5-7

lenders.loan_because: So little can make a huge difference. Kiva makes it easy to donate and to keep donating.

lenders.name: Missy

lenders.name: Anna

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college age Americans about the world and global environmental challenges.

lenders.name: Bethany
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to live well and do what they love
lenders.occupational_info: my passion is post-disaster and post-conflict urban regeneration. Helping to rebuild and recreate communities that have been jarred and disjointed by disasters natural or man-made.

lenders.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of my toddler daughter, Ella.

lenders.loan_because: If people are willing to take a chance by asking for a loan to better or change their lives then I am willing to take a chance in fullfillling this request.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that operates schools which teaches people how to cook.

lenders.name: Harry

lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in leasing and sell ing retail stores, offices, warehouses and residential buildings.

lenders.name: Mr BizPlan
lenders.loan_because: I help people here in the US start businesses as my full time job.  I do my job because I love seeing new entrepreneurs fulfill their dreams.  Kiva.org gives me another way that I can help entrepreneurs world wide that need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an SBDC consultant in Fargo, ND.  I am also a college professor for the University of Mary.  In addition, I own a pizza restaurant and a small business website  http://www.diybizplan.com.  I love entrepreneurship and more so...I love entrepreneurs!

lenders.name: Doctor Daigle
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed/fortunate and feel that it is my responsibility to spread the wealth.

lenders.name: Seth and Kelly
lenders.loan_because: With what little we can loan can not only build a community but someday help build an entire country.

lenders.name: Mike Balotti
lenders.loan_because: i believe in supporting those who have drive and supporting those who need a start.
lenders.occupational_info: We have an organization that assists troubled adolescents, and helps them to find a new and healthier path.

lenders.name: Alaina
lenders.loan_because: I grew up under the poverty level and was helped by others in order to get a successful career.  I want to be able to do the same for women around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the go-between for the business side and the technology side to ensure that each understands each other and each others needs.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to the world in a tangible and hopefully successful way to say thank you to my parents for all that they have given me.

lenders.name: Jack (and Mama and Dad)
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: When you reap the harvest of your land, do not reap to the very edges of your field or gather the gleanings of your harvest. Leave them for the poor and the alien. I am the LORD your God (Leviticus 23:22)

lenders.name: Sheldon
lenders.loan_because:
I like being connected to people around the world.

It is hard to contribute to communities as you travel and KIVA is an efficient way to assist people in places I briefly visit or regions I only can dream of traveling to.  

I love to see people starting new businesses and sharing the entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people build companies that can grow very large.  My day job is managing financial and operational risk for a geotechnical engineering company.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: We have so much in Canada and we need to spread it around and help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Hairdresser/Psychologist (hahaha)

lenders.name: JamieB
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to improve their life and their world.  I am answering the knock of opportunity in my world to help others do the same in their's.
lenders.occupational_info: I help computer programmers create better computer programs.

lenders.name: Wallace Family
lenders.loan_because: When we each do a little, a lot gets done...
lenders.occupational_info: Our family was always taught to reach out and help.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a dream and work toward it with determination.  Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to run a non-profit resale store to raise money which is donated to animal welfare (Humane Society) in my community.

lenders.name: sonoko
lenders.loan_because: i'm very privileged to have education and opportunities thanks to being born in the US, and i especially enjoy helping other women.  it's the right thing to do and very gratifying to be a small part of making the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: i work for a computer maintenance company, and manage the department that handles all billing, price quotes, and contracts.

lenders.name: Justin and Dominique
lenders.occupation: Senior Manager Online Operations and Sales
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help out in other countries, to see who you are helping and to give back a little something since we have been given so much.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people make smart choices!

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: Others helped me move from poverty and it's nice to pay it forward. And at $25 a loan, it's cheaper than therapy or a bad boyfriend! (Definitely much cheaper than the latter!)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a management & research consultant who is technically educated (MA) but find my greatest skills are ones I was born with: curious, helpful and flexible.

lenders.name: Tim Kreidler
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping patients

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: The KIVA concept is just incredible. I can give/loan money to people who DESERVE it and because of their geographic & economic arenas, my dollars can do so much more.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist patients with their pulmonary needs

lenders.name: S.K.S. Khalsa
lenders.loan_because: I am a fellow human being and I am fortunate to have some money that I can loan.  I am so sad that banking systems around the world are instruments of injustice rather than empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach kids with learning, emotional and social difficulties.

lenders.name: Kelley
lenders.loan_because: I want to help wherever I can.

lenders.name: Mike Macadaan
lenders.loan_because: Given that entrepreneurship is a big component to what we're doing at Twiistup, Kiva is an obvious fit.  We're partnering up with Kiva.org because we're big-big fans of what they're doing.
lenders.occupational_info: Twiistup is an organization dedicated to giving attention to entrepreneurs and startups.  The attention that we can provide at our events and on our website will result in connections that can help with funding, recruitment and like-minded community building.

lenders.name: Students of bsappong
lenders.loan_because: It works!!!

lenders.name: chloe's family
lenders.loan_because: we want to teach our daughter the importance of sharing with those in need.  it is a value she can carry with her through her whole life.

lenders.name: Dan & Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that I can help people in a longer-term way by giving them the means to create financial stability for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: To help others to grow their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: Service Industry

lenders.name: Matt Calcara
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place, one small business at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Digital Strategy Production = soooo, how should we do this whole website thing?

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I'm extremely fortunate to have the life I lead. I believe the best way to show appreciate for what I have is to help someone else gain a chance in life
lenders.occupational_info: I develop fabric and the washes--the "look" that go on blue jeans.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help hard-working people. The expense of starting a business can stop many good ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work in banking and in business planning. I live in a small house next to the ocean and near a mountain. My husband and I go hiking every day on the mountain.

lenders.name: Don and Cara
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Rhona & Kathy
lenders.loan_because: it's a way to directly impact someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I am capable to and I feel the need to give back.
